text: Is it possible to get the deal owner name from a deal fetched with crm_object? There's a `HubSpot_owner_id` property, but that only gets me the ID. Is the owner something else I can fetch with crm_object, or is there some other property I can fetch?
unfortunately no - hubl is being run server side, before the page renders, Js (not being node in this case) is being run client side. You can however set js variables to hubl values.
